remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于汇总从单个位置中的 Web 页上的所有验证程序的错误消息。The class is used to summarize the error messages from all validators on a Web page in a single location. 你可以通过分配汇总从一组在网页上的验证程序的错误消息到通过设置验证组控件属性。You can summarize the error messages from a group of validators on a Web page by assigning the control to a validation group by setting the property. 可以显示摘要，为列表、 项目符号列表中，或一个段落，基于属性。The summary can be displayed as a list, as a bulleted list, or as a single paragraph, based on the property. 摘要可以显示在网页上以及在消息框通过设置和属性，分别。The summary can be displayed on the Web page and in a message box by setting the and properties, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 当你使用控件内部控制，请确保该验证程序控件与之关联的控件位于同一面板。When you use the control inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 有关使用，控制为部分页面更新，请参阅[局部页面呈现概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件汇总 Web 页上的所有验证控件中的错误消息并在项目符号列表中显示它们。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to summarize the error messages from all validation controls on a Web page and display them in a bulleted list. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证组允许您将在页面上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组都可以独立于其他页上的验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用属性来为其指定验证组的名称控件将汇总错误消息。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control will summarize error messages. 当指定的值概括了属性，从指定的组的一部分的验证控件的唯一的错误消息。When you specify a value for the property, only error messages from the validation controls that are part of the specified group are summarized. 如果未设置此属性的值，将汇总从页面上未分配给验证组的验证控件的所有错误消息。If you do not set a value for this property, all error messages from validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are summarized. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
